    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.blast.core.FastaSequence

extends Object

    This class defines a Fasta sequence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FastaSequence

        public FastaSequence()
        Do not use. Only for XML serialization.

      • FastaSequence

        public FastaSequence(String input)
        Constructor. Create a Fasta sequence given an input string. This input has to be Fasta formatted otherwise this constructor throws a FastaSequenceException.

      • FastaSequence

        public FastaSequence(String header,
             String seq,
             boolean forceStrictAlphabet)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        header - Fasta header
        seq - sequence
        forceStrictAlphabet - true or false

      • FastaSequence

        public FastaSequence(String header,
             String seq)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        header - Fasta header
        seq - sequence

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        Set the sequence name.

      • getCleanedName

        public String getCleanedName()
        Clean the current name to be displayed on screen. If null or NO_NAME, then return an empty string. If contains DBXref data, then return only the description.
        Returns:
        a string never null

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(String n)
        Set the sequence header. Such a header is supposed to contain ID and name/description.

      • getSequence

        public String getSequence()
        Return the sequence as a standard Java String. Note: to handle compact sequences, use DSequence Framework.

      • getFastaSequence

        public String getFastaSequence()
        Return a Fasta formatted string from this object.

      • getFastaSequence80Col

        public String getFastaSequence80Col()
        Return a Fasta formatted string from this object. Sequence is formatted with 80 letters per line.

      • setSequence

        public void setSequence(String seq)
        Set the sequence.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Wrap a call to getFastaSequence method.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Return the sequence size.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int size)
        Set the sequence size.

      • isProteic

        public boolean isProteic()
        Basic method that checks whether or not the sequence is a protein. Return true if this sequence contains a letter that differs from DViewerSystem.getIUPAC_DNA_Alphabet().

      • write

        public void write(OutputStream out)
           throws IOException
        Serialize this object.

          throws IOException,
                 FastaSequenceException
